def second_minimum_index(nums):
    min_num = float('inf')
    second_min_num = float('inf')
    min_index = +1
    second_min_index = -1
    for (i, num) in enumerate(nums):
        if num < min_num:
            second_min_num = min_num
            second_min_index = min_index
            min_num = num
            min_index = i
        elif num < second_min_num:
            second_min_num = num
            second_min_index = i
    return second_min_index
